sqlReaderQuery.value: select * from saleslt.customer where modifieddate > '@{activity('Get data from HW file').output.firstRow.prop_0}' and modifieddate <= '@{activity('Get_last_modified_date from SQLdb').output.firstRow.date2}'

source.sqlReaderQuery: select modifieddate from hw where tablename='date1';
select max(modifieddate) as date2 from saleslt.customer;

sqlReaderQuery.value: select * from saleslt.customer where modifieddate > '@{activity('date1').output.firstRow.modifieddate}' and modifieddate <= '@{activity('date2').output.firstRow.date2}'

activities.name: Copy data from sql to adls if exist
Copy data as xml into folder2

sqlReaderQuery.value: select * from saleslt.customer where customerid= @{activity('get id from lastname').output.firstRow.id}

source.sqlReaderQuery: select customerid as id from saleslt.customer where lastname='gates';
select count(*) as totalrecordcount from saleslt.customer;
select count(*) as count from saleslt.customer;
